events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service representative for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received to help us process your refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and provide you with a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and support. I appreciate your help resolving this.
We have processed the refund and sent return shipping instructions to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we've confirmed the refund was issued and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you!
